column5: Has anyone stayed at the Northside Motel in Vermillion Bay, Ont. Any recommendations?

Snowpro, We stayed there in 2011. We thought it was slightly overpriced ($90-100 w/tax per room), but it was clean. I saved their business card so that we could stay there again when in the neighborhood, so must've been satisfactory, LOL! Btw, there's a great bbq place nearby which I would highly recommend...good food! John

I stayed at the Pine Grove last week. It's right at the intersection of 17 and 105. $79 per night. It was clean and good enough for a night's sleep. They have a free continental b'fast, but it's not available until 7:00 and I left before that.

Pine grove just east a few blocks is okay too. Have stayed there many times over the years. Have motel rooms and cabins to rent 1-807-227-2013! Nice family run deal. Just a few dollars cheaper I think.
Never been to either but have eaten at the bbq joint (Busters)good breakfast and not priced to bad.
Agree with others here - nothing special, but it is clean & a great place to use as a hub if you bring your own boat & want to fish a different lake everyday. Busters is awesome.
